sentence.Network_en: Aim To investigate the lactate transportation of myocardium sarcolemmal vesicle ( SLV ) in normotensive and hypertensive rats.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的在离体心脏灌流模型及分离的心肌肌膜囊泡上,比较自发性高血压大鼠(SHR)和对照 ( Wistar- KyotoWKY ) 大鼠心肌L- 14C- 乳酸盐的摄入,及心肌肌膜囊泡(SLV)对乳酸盐转运的特征.
